title: Ticket #3151: data_plugin broken, requires , in url
description:
NOTE: The data_plugin is not documented.

The data_plugin does not work. It expects a url of: data://,the_data_no_spaces/filename

It can be used as: transfer_input_files = data://,the_data_no_spaces/filename

The problem is that "," is interpreted by condor_submit as a separator, leading to confusion about input files being "data://" and "the_data_no_spaces/filename"

The data_plugin should look for ":" (instead of ",") and fast forward to the data (after "//").

NOTE: When FT plugins fail to retrieve data jobs are put on hold with a undefined HoldReason.
